name: fights
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spectation_sports_events_api.
Tool description: View upcoming events, fighters, fights and more from Spectation Sports.
API description: Fetches fights for either upcoming or previous events from the Spectation Sports Events API.

outcome.description: The outcome of the fights to filter by. Defaults to None.

sport.description: The type of sport to filter the fights by. Defaults to None.

type.description: The type of fights to fetch (e.g., 'upcoming' or 'previous'). Defaults to 'upcoming'.

category.description: The category or weight division of the fights. Defaults to None.

event.description: The ID of the event to fetch fights for. Defaults to None.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

fighter.description: The ID of the fighter to fetch fights for. Defaults to None.
